column1: '''Mugwort''' was a common family name among the [[Bree-hobbits]].<ref>{{FR
Mugwort is the name of the plant [[Wikipedia:Artemisia (genus)
column2: Artemisia]] akin to Wormwood. Tolkien mentioned that there is no special reason for the choice of Mugwort, except its hobbit-like sound.<ref name="Nomen">{{HM
